The Epp client will look for valid credit card numbers to reduce false positives. This is why there are multiple option to select for the predefined credit card numbers.
1111-2222-3333-4444 may not be detected because it might not match as a credit card number.
You can try a credit card validator to see if this matches with a credit card number.
This Email may contain confidential information. Not to be disclosed to third parties without prior written approval.
